meanings.definition: Nonbroadcasts: plural noun - programs or content that are not transmitted over the airwaves
meanings.sent1: The library has a collection of nonbroadcasts for educational purposes.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching nonbroadcasts on streaming platforms.
meanings.sent3: The nonbroadcasts were so boring that they put the audience to sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of nonbroadcasts waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The nonbroadcasts filled the room with knowledge and entertainment.

meanings.definition: Nonbroadcasts: verb - to not transmit a message or program over the airwaves
meanings.sent1: He chose to nonbroadcast the confidential information for security reasons.
meanings.sent2: The radio station decided to nonbroadcast the controversial interview.
meanings.sent3: She would always nonbroadcast her feelings to avoid confrontation.
meanings.sent4: The decision to nonbroadcast the news spread quickly among the team.
meanings.sent5: The spy's mission was to nonbroadcast any sensitive data.
